thread.title: Dorothy Gibson

author: Dorothy Gibson
title: Dorothy Gibson
text: I found Trusted Housesitters an efficient to and easy to use site. All communications were speedy and when I needed a little help it was available really quickly, I even received a call in the evening after office hours. My house sit was excellent too, just as described ( perhaps even better). I will definitely use the site again and recommend it to friends.
